verbs.description: [ARG0: A man] [V: shouting] [ARG1: rhetoric against President Trump] lured police into an " ambush - type " shootout Friday in the lobby of a hotel at the Trump National Doral Golf Club near Miami , police said . Trump was not at the hotel at the time .

[ARG0: A man shouting rhetoric against President Trump] [V: lured] [ARG1: police] [ARG2: into an " ambush - type " shootout] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARGM-LOC: in the lobby of a hotel at the Trump National Doral Golf Club near Miami] , police said . Trump was not at the hotel at the time .

A man shouting rhetoric against President Trump lured police into an " ambush - type " shootout Friday in the lobby of a hotel at the Trump National Doral Golf Club near Miami , [ARG0: police] [V: said] . [C-ARG1: Trump was not at the hotel at the time] .

A man shouting rhetoric against President Trump lured police into an " ambush - type " shootout Friday in the lobby of a hotel at the Trump National Doral Golf Club near Miami , police said . [ARG1: Trump] [V: was] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: at the hotel] [ARGM-TMP: at the time] .
